params.elemSpec: Element type layout for objects of this kind

returns.rev: Valid revision number (0 if not found)

returns.elems: Element hashes of the kind at the revision

returns.active: True if all specified kinds exist and are active

kindAdmit(uint64,uint32,uint64).notice: Checks whether a kind at a given revision admits a specific relation

kindDescriptor(uint64,uint32).notice: Returns the descriptor at a given revision

kindOwner(uint64).notice: Returns the current owner of a kind

kindRevision(uint64,uint32).notice: Resolves and validates a specific revision

kindSnapshot(uint64,uint32).notice: Returns descriptor and elements at a specific revision

kindSota(uint64).notice: Returns the latest descriptor and current owner of a kind

kindStatus(uint64[]).notice: Checks whether all specified kinds are active (rev > 0)

kindTouch(uint64).notice: Touches a kind (bumps revision with no content changes)

kindUpdate(uint64,bytes32,bytes32).notice: Updates code and/or data of an existing kind

kindUpdate(uint64,bytes32,bytes32,uint64.notice: Updates code, data, and relations of an existing kind

kindUpdate(uint64,uint64[]).notice: Updates supported relations of an existing kind

kindUpgrade(uint64,uint32,uint32).notice: Upgrades kind/set revision of an existing kind
